  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CheckInactiveSecurityAndDividendeInterestTask
    This involves checking whether dividends or interest for positions held are recorded in the transactions.
    CheckReloadSecurityAdjustedPricesAfterSplitTask
    If a split is added for a security, it may take a few days for the adjusted historical price data to be available from the data provider.
    CopyTenantToDemoAccountsTask
    Copies the data of one client to other clients.
    CreateStockexchangeTradingDaysMinusByIndexTask
    An index can be used to track the free trading days on a trading venue.
    CurrencyChangedTenantAndPortfolioTask
    Changed currency of tenant and portfolio it needs a creation of currencies and possible recreation of holing tables.
    CurrencyChangedTenantOrPortfolioTask
    If the main currency of a tenant or one of their portfolios changes, any missing currency pairs must be created for this main currency.
    HoldingSecurityRebuildTask
    When a security split happens it influences the calculation of the performance.
    LoadEcbCurrencyExchangeRatesTask
    Updating a currency pair such as USD/CHF takes place in two steps.
    LoadEmptyCurrencypairHistoryquotesTask
     
    MonitorHistoricalPriceDataTask
    Checks whether a connector for historical price data may no longer be working.
    MonitorIntradayPriceDataTask
    Checks whether a connector for intraday price data may no longer be working.
    PeriodicallyDividendUpdCheckTask
    The following algorithm is used to determine possible missing dividend income in the dividend entity for securities.
    PriceDividendSplitCalendarUpdateTask
    It reads the EOD day from external resources and the dividend, split calendars.
    RebuildHoldingCashaccountDepositTask
     
    RebuildHolingAllTenantOrSingleTask
    The inventory tables are only updated if the transactions are processed in the usual way.
    SecurityLoadHistoricalIntraPriceDataTask
    When a security is created, the intraday and historical price data is read.
    TransactionCostEstimatorWekaTask
    Train a model to forecast the transaction cost for the for the different trading platform, it does not include other cost like taxes.
    UDFUser0FillPersitentValueTask
    Some global user-defined fields have a longer validity period.
    UpdateDividendForSecurityTask
    Normally called when the dividend data connector is changed.
    UpdateSplitForSecurityTask
    Is triggered if the data connector of the split has been changed or if a possible new split has been detected in the split calendar.
